description:
Sasanishiki continues to refuse the invitations to join Love Rice. Then, for some reason, there`s suddenly a train track running through the school yard, and a dog is trapped on the track as a train rushes toward it. Love Rice is frozen in place, but Sasanishiki rushes forward. Sasanishiki`s skill and drive when it comes to Harvest Shows was once said to rival Koshihikari himself, but the story Morinokuma begins to tell about his past is one nobody expected...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kokyou ni Nishiki o Kazaru no Da
Sasanishiki Is Going Home a Hero
